nodes.text: Pia was a Human female with fair skin and dark-colored eyes. She wore hooded yellow robes that resembled the clothing of Naboo royal handmaidens.

Pia was created for the 2010 art book, Star Wars Art: Visions, by painter Anthony J. Ryder, who painted her portrait over a period of six months between November 2008 and May 2009. Even though she was pictured, no back-story was given to her in the book. Ryder used the handmaidens of Queen of Naboo Padmé Amidala as inspiration for Pia's intended expression of "quiet reserve, presence, compassion, and attraction."
